short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplicity is key - a pop-up notepad for Chrome in its simplest form.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Lightweight and easy-to-use pop-up notepad for Chrome.
- Simple and minimalistic design.
- Auto-save feature saves notes as you type.
- Notes are stored locally in your browser's storage (data may be lost if the extension is uninstalled or browser data is cleared).
- Free to use with no ads or in-app purchases.
